category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 3-2 (National Pension Research Institute)
contents: Article 3-2 (National Pension Research Institute) ① The Corporation may establish and operate the National Pension Research Institute in order to perform the duties stipulated in Article 25, Paragraph 7 of the National Pension Act (hereinafter referred to as the *Act)., ② National Pension Research Institute’s The director is appointed by the board of directors from among those who meet the following requirements: 1. A person with at least 7 years of research experience after obtaining a doctoral degree, with extensive knowledge and good reputation regarding the national pension; 2. A person with the same qualifications as No. 1. ③ Details necessary for the sub-organization and operation of the National Pension Research Institute are determined by the Corporation’s “National Pension Research Institute Operation Regulations”. [This article was newly established on December 28, 2016]
